repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Photocopy of first contract between the New York Joint Board of the Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America and the New York Clothing Manufacturers' Exchange, signed in 1924, as well as a letter of transmittal from Sidney Orenstein to Jack Sheinkman from 1994.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a photocopy of first contract between the New York Joint Board of the Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America and the New York Clothing Manufacturers' Exchange, signed in 1924, and a letter of transmittal from Sidney Orenstein to Jack Sheinkman from 1994.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: ACWA Collective Bargaining Agreement #5973m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
